thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Craft Brew Alliance Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Craft Brew Alliance Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.05
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Craft Brew Alliance Inc:
* CRAFT BREW ALLIANCE REPORTS RECORD PERFORMANCE IN 2017 AND EXPECTS CONTINUED IMPROVEMENTS IN 2018
* SAYS ‍CONFIRMING FINANCIAL GUIDANCE FOR 2018​ * QTRLY SHIPMENTS DECREASED 5.6% OVER THE SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR
* QTRLY ‍NET SALES WERE $46.0 MILLION AND FLAT COMPARED TO Q4 IN 2016​
* CRAFT BREW ALLIANCE - DUE TO TAX LAW CHANGE, ADJUSTED QTRLY DEFERRED TAX LIABILITIES, RESULTING IN FAVORABLE INCOME TAX ADJUSTMENT OF $6.9 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.04, REVENUE VIEW $46.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
